errors.description: An attribute has an invalid value that doesn't match the expected type or format.
errors.resolution: Check the attribute value against the schema documentation.

errors.description: An unrecognized element was found in the WiX source.
errors.resolution: Check the element name spelling and ensure it's a valid WiX element.

errors.message_template: The {0} element contains an unexpected attribute {1}
errors.description: An element contains an attribute that is not valid for that element type.
errors.resolution: Remove the unexpected attribute or check spelling.

errors.message_template: The {0} element contains an unexpected child element {1}
errors.description: An element contains a child element that is not valid within that parent.
errors.resolution: Move the child element to the correct parent or remove it.

errors.description: Text content was found where it is not allowed.
errors.resolution: Remove the text content from the element.

errors.message_template: The required attribute {0}/{1} was not found
errors.description: A required attribute is missing from an element.
errors.resolution: Add the required attribute to the element.

errors.message_template: The {0} element requires a child element
errors.description: A parent element is missing required child elements.
The WiX source file contains invalid XML.
errors.resolution: Fix the XML syntax error at the indicated location.

errors.description: An XML namespace was used that WiX doesn't recognize.
errors.resolution: Check the namespace URI and ensure the extension is installed.

errors.message_template: The {0} attribute must be empty when {1} is specified
errors.description: Two mutually exclusive attributes were specified together.
errors.resolution: Remove one of the conflicting attributes.

errors.message_template: The {0} attribute must have a value
errors.description: An attribute was specified with an empty value.
errors.resolution: Provide a valid value for the attribute.

errors.message_template: The {0} attribute value '{1}' is not a valid identifier
errors.description: An identifier attribute contains invalid characters.
errors.resolution: Use only letters, numbers, underscores, and dots in identifiers.

errors.message_template: The {0} attribute value '{1}' is not a valid long identifier
errors.description: A long identifier exceeds the maximum length.
errors.resolution: Shorten the identifier to 72 characters or less.

errors.message_template: The {0} attribute value '{1}' is not a valid short identifier
errors.description: A short identifier exceeds the maximum length.
errors.resolution: Shorten the identifier to 38 characters or less.

errors.message_template: The {0} attribute value '{1}' is too long
errors.description: An attribute value exceeds the maximum allowed length.

errors.message_template: The {0} element is missing required attribute {1}
errors.description: A required attribute is not present on the element.
An element requires content but has none.

errors.message_template: The {0} attribute value contains invalid characters
errors.description: The attribute value contains characters not allowed in that context.
errors.resolution: Remove or escape the invalid characters.

errors.message_template: The {0} attribute must be one of: {1}
errors.description: An enumeration attribute has an invalid value.
errors.resolution: Use one of the valid enumeration values.

errors.message_template: The {0} attribute has an unexpected value: {1}
errors.description: An attribute value is not in the list of valid values.
errors.resolution: Use one of the valid values for this attribute.

errors.description: A preprocessor function was called that doesn't exist.
errors.resolution: Check the function name spelling or define the function.

errors.description: A preprocessor variable was referenced but not defined.
errors.resolution: Define the variable using <?define Name=Value?> or pass it via command line.

errors.description: Invalid syntax in a preprocessor directive.
A <?include?> directive references a file that cannot be found.
errors.resolution: Verify the include path is correct.

errors.description: An include file chain creates a circular reference.
A preprocessor function encountered an error.
errors.resolution: Check the function arguments and syntax.

errors.description: A variable was defined multiple times.
errors.resolution: Remove duplicate definitions or use different names.

errors.description: A preprocessor <?if?> block is not properly closed.
An <?endif?> was found without a matching <?if?>.
errors.resolution: Remove the extraneous <?endif?> or add the matching <?if?>.

errors.description: A referenced file could not be found.
errors.resolution: Verify the file path is correct and the file exists.

errors.message_template: The Wix element must be the root element
errors.description: The Wix element is not at the root of the document.
errors.resolution: Ensure Wix is the document root element.

errors.message_template: The {0} element requires the {1} attribute when {2}
errors.description: A conditionally required attribute is missing.
errors.resolution: Add the required attribute for the given configuration.

errors.message_template: The environment variable '{0}' is not defined
errors.description: A referenced environment variable doesn't exist.
errors.resolution: Define the environment variable or use a default value.

errors.description: Binary data is malformed or corrupt.

errors.message_template: The {0} attribute cannot have the value '{1}' when {2}
errors.description: An attribute value is invalid in the current context.
errors.resolution: Change the attribute value or configuration.

errors.description: A WiX extension is required but not available.
An attribute is deprecated and may be removed.
An element is deprecated and may be removed.
A file cannot be read due to permissions or lock.
errors.resolution: Check file permissions and ensure it's not locked.

errors.description: A version string is not in the expected format.
The same identifier is used multiple times.
errors.resolution: Use unique identifiers for each element.
Choose a different identifier that is not reserved.

errors.description: The WiX source file contains no content.
errors.resolution: Add WiX content to the source file.

errors.description: A condition expression has invalid syntax.
errors.resolution: Check the condition syntax and operators.

errors.message_template: The {0} element must have a unique key
errors.description: An element that requires a unique key is missing one.
errors.resolution: Add a unique key attribute value.

errors.message_template: The directory structure exceeds maximum depth
Component '{0}' has no files or registry entries
errors.description: A component is empty and will not install anything.
errors.resolution: Add content to the component or remove it.

errors.description: No Media element is defined for embedded files.
errors.resolution: Add a Media element or use MediaTemplate.

errors.description: A file or directory path is malformed.
errors.resolution: Use a valid Windows path format.

errors.description: The file version could not be extracted.
errors.resolution: Specify the version explicitly or verify the file exists.

errors.message_template: The {0} column value exceeds maximum length of {1}
errors.description: A database column value is too long.
errors.resolution: Shorten the value to fit the column limit.

errors.description: A directory could not be created.
The icon file is not a valid icon format.
A shortcut key combination is malformed.
An invalid registry hive was specified.
errors.resolution: Use HKCR, HKCU, HKLM, HKU, or HKMU.

errors.description: An invalid registry value type was specified.
errors.resolution: Use string, integer, binary, expandable, or multiString.

errors.description: A feature is defined without any component references.
errors.resolution: Add ComponentRef elements to the feature.

errors.description: Features reference each other in a cycle.

errors.message_template: The custom action '{0}' has invalid type
errors.description: The custom action type combination is invalid.
errors.resolution: Use a valid custom action type.

errors.message_template: DLL custom action '{0}' missing entry point
errors.description: A DLL custom action requires an entry point.
A script custom action has no script content.
An invalid sequence table was specified.
errors.resolution: Use a valid sequence table name.

errors.message_template: The custom action '{0}' cannot be scheduled in {1}
errors.description: A custom action is in an invalid sequence location.
errors.resolution: Move the custom action to a valid sequence.

errors.message_template: The custom action '{0}' has no scheduling
errors.description: A custom action is defined but not scheduled.
errors.resolution: Add the custom action to a sequence.

errors.message_template: Deferred custom action '{0}' cannot access properties
errors.description: Deferred custom actions can't read properties directly.
An impersonated action may fail in elevated context.
errors.resolution: Consider using NoImpersonate for elevated actions.

errors.description: A service element is missing a required attribute.
The service start type is invalid.
errors.resolution: Use auto, demand, disabled, boot, or system.

errors.description: The service error control value is invalid.
A service has no start/stop/delete controls.
A service dependency refers to an unknown service.
Services depend on each other in a cycle.
A permission value is not recognized.
An access control list entry is malformed.

errors.message_template: The certificate '{0}' could not be loaded
errors.description: A certificate file could not be read.
errors.resolution: Verify the certificate path and format.

errors.description: The certificate store name is invalid.
errors.resolution: Use a valid certificate store name.

errors.description: A component installs to multiple directories.
errors.resolution: Create separate components for each directory.

errors.description: A component is missing a key path specification.
errors.resolution: Add KeyPath='yes' to one file or registry entry.

errors.description: A component has KeyPath on multiple items.
errors.resolution: Remove KeyPath from all but one item.

errors.description: An invalid assembly type was specified.
A Win32 assembly is missing its manifest.
A culture name is not recognized.
errors.resolution: Use a valid culture name (e.g., en-US).

errors.description: An invalid processor architecture was specified.
errors.resolution: Use x86, x64, ia64, arm, or arm64.

errors.description: A versioned file has no version information.
The cabinet file name is invalid.
A cabinet file is too large.

errors.resolution: Check if the file is accessible.

errors.description: The same file appears twice in a cabinet.

errors.message_template: The merge module '{0}' could not be opened
errors.description: A merge module file could not be read.
A merge module has conflicting content.

errors.message_template: The {0} {1} is orphaned and will not be processed
errors.description: An element is defined but not referenced.
errors.resolution: Add a reference or remove if unused.
Report to WiX support with source file.

errors.description: The compiler ran out of memory.
errors.resolution: Reduce source file size or increase memory.

errors.message_template: The '{0}' localization variable is not defined
errors.description: A localization string was not found.
errors.resolution: Define the localization variable in WXL file.

errors.description: A localization variable is defined but not used.
A required culture is not localized.
No Product or Module element was found.
errors.resolution: Add a Product or Module root element.

errors.message_template: Cannot have both Product and Module
errors.description: Both Product and Module were specified.
errors.resolution: Use either Product or Module, not both.

errors.message_template: The Package element must be inside Product
errors.resolution: Move Package inside the Product element.

errors.description: Upgrade Id doesn't match the package UpgradeCode.

errors.message_template: Major upgrade will remove all features
errors.resolution: Consider if this is the intended behavior.

errors.description: The version range for upgrade is malformed.
A property is defined multiple times.
A defined property is not referenced.
Attempted to set a restricted property.
A property name has invalid characters.
A search signature is defined twice.

errors.resolution: Use a unique Id for each element.

errors.description: The registry search path exceeds limits.
The file search path exceeds limits.
A component search references invalid GUID.
A product search uses invalid GUID.
errors.resolution: Use a valid product code GUID.

errors.description: A referenced UI element doesn't exist.
errors.resolution: Define the UI element or use correct name.
Include the dialog or correct the reference.
Add the control or fix the reference.

errors.description: An unknown control type was specified.
errors.resolution: Use a valid MSI control type.

errors.message_template: The {0} reference '{1}' could not be resolved
errors.description: A reference could not be found.
A control event is not recognized.
A dialog is defined without controls.
A text style specification is invalid.
A billboard image is missing or invalid.
An error message Id is out of range.
A launch condition expression is malformed.
A launch condition has no error message.
An error occurred creating a patch.
Instance transform needs a Product element.
A transform modifies the product code.
errors.resolution: Verify product code change is intended.

errors.description: No Bundle element found for bootstrapper.
A Bundle requires a Chain element.
The bundle Chain has no packages.
An unsupported package type in Chain.
An EXE package needs install command.
A package has no install detection.
Package exit code definition is invalid.
Payload Id is used multiple times.
BA DLL or executable not found.
BA entry point function not found.
A referenced bundle variable doesn't exist.
A defined variable is not used.

errors.message_template: Package has vital='no' and may fail silently

errors.description: A referenced package group doesn't exist.
Layout only conflicts with other options.

errors.resolution: Check disk space and file permissions.

errors.description: Too many files in one cabinet.

errors.message_template: Delta patch is larger than full file

errors.description: An invalid GUID format was provided.

errors.message_template: Generated GUID may vary between builds

errors.description: UpgradeCode is not a valid GUID.
Attribute is not valid for this element.
Not enough space for output file.

errors.message_template: The '{0}' attribute cannot be specified with {1}
The {0} table is deprecated in WiX v4
The {0} attribute is deprecated in v4

errors.description: Element has new name in v4.
Object file is corrupt or invalid.
Symbol not found in any wixobj.
Source file is not valid XML.
